head.b:template-skin:
<!-- CSS code to style Layout options ---!>


body#layout(
width:900px;
margin:0;
padding:10px;
position:relative;
}
body#layout .add_widget
position:raltive;
border:0;
padding:10px;
border_radius:15px;
background-color:#f1f1f1;
}
body#layout .add_widget a{
font-size:15px;
cursor:pointer;
}
body#layout .layout-widget-description, body#layout #search-box{
display:none;
}
body#layout div.section{
padding:17px!important;
margin:0 5px 10px!important;
border:5px solid #fff;
}
body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{
background-color:#597ea5;
}
body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap3{
background-color:#fff;
}
body#layout div.layout-title{
font-size:13px;
padding-top:7px;
}
body#layout .section h4{
font-size:14px;
margin:0;
}

body#layout #header-section {
  display: block;
}


body#layout .post-wrapper{
display:flex;
}

body#layout .post-wrapper #main-wrapper{
width:75%;
}

body#layout .footer{
clear:both;
display:flex;
grid-gap:10px;
}
body#layout #header{
padding: 0 1em;
  display: flex;
}
body#layout #messagebox{
background-color:#fff9d2;
}

body#layout #messagebox h4{
font-size: 21px;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-weight: 500;
}
